potionbrewer:Lab.NAME: Potion Lab -- Override
DESCRIPTIONS: You find yourself in your old ~Potion~ ~Laboratory.~ NL NL There are a few potions left over, but you wonder if your prized possession is still secure. You check the seal on the door to its hidden compartment and verify that it's still secure.
OPTIONS: [Open Secret Compartment] Lose all your potions, take the #gAlchemist's #gFlask.

potionbrewer:IdentityCrisisEvent.NAME: Identity Crisis
DESCRIPTIONS: As you move through ~The~ ~City~ you come across a #pPurple #pMirror. NL You look at it, but you see no reflection.
OPTIONS: [TOUCH THE MIRROR] TOUCH TOUCH TO#C# TOUCH TO UCH TOUCH #rTOUCH TOUCH
